text: The Evangelical Church of the Augsburg Confession in Austria (Evangelische Kirche Augsburgischen Bekenntnisses in Österreich) is a Lutheran denomination in Austria. It is a member of the Lutheran World Federation, which it joined in 1947. It is also a member of the World Council of Churches, the Conference of European Churches and the Community of Protestant Churches in Europe as well as the Conference of Churches on the Rhine. ==Structure== The Evangelical Church of the Augsburg Confession in Austria is headed by a Bishop – currently the Reverend Dr Michael Bünker. The church consists of seven dioceses, each headed by a Superintendent.
